56.comment: Simple button. Connect to 'fire' to trigger actions when the button is pressed.

89.author: undefined
89.message: Set the inset as: this.setPadding(Rectangle.inset(4,2)).  This gives it a more pleasing appearance with a border, and also makes it easier to select near the bounds.
